title: krupai paarayya
sahitya:
krpai pArayyA gai yArayyA tribuvana prabhu nIrayyA

anupallavi
 
apAra krpAkara kumarayyA amita parAkrama murugayyA

caraNam
 
nAtha nAn unaiyE nambinEn ayyA bhUmpAdanE sadbhakta paripAlana
prakhyAtanE kunjaradAsan enai innam shOdanai sheyyAdena vEdanai tIrttaruLi
